name: rtx-video-enhancer
description: Chrome extension that enables NVIDIA RTX Super Resolution for video streaming services
author: sabamotto

scripts.build: echo 'No build required for this extension'
scripts.pack:unix: zip -r rtx-video-enhancer.zip manifest.json *.js *.html icons/ LICENSE.md README.md -x generate_icons.py -x package.json -x README_JA.md
